text: Then he took the crown from the head of their king.12:30 Or from the head of Milcom. Milcom, also called Molech, was god of the Ammonites; see Leviticus 18:21 and 1 Kings 11:7. It weighed a talent of gold 12:30 A talent is approximately 75.4 pounds or 34.2 kilograms of gold. and was set with precious stones, and it was placed on Davidâ€™s head. And David took a great amount of plunder from the city.
